body_html: Adding a default GPU config has significant impact on build time. Since 3.5 and 3.7 are largely compatible, it is better to keep the default config number low. Unless we see a non-trivial change in performance, we'd prefer to leave the current setting unchanged. Power users can still use configure to choose their favorite compute capabilities.
